arts.ttl: Virgil van Dijk contract update: Liverpool captain has 'decided' future amidst interest from European giant
arts.sum: Virgil van Dijk is said to have come to a decision regarding his future at Liverpool, with his contract at Anfield set to expire at the end of the seaoson.

arts.ttl: Spain edge past Netherlands on penalties as three Nations League quarter-finals go to extra time
arts.sum: Spain’s shootout win over the Netherlands was one of three quarter-final ties that required extra time

arts.ttl: Netherlands Player Ratings in penalty loss v Spain
arts.sum: Netherlands missed out on the Nations League semi-finals after a penalty shootout loss to Spain. Below is the player ratings for Oranje. Bart Verbruggen 7.5/10: He may have conceded three goals but Verbruggen made a number of excellent saves during the game. He kept the Netherlands in it early on and even kept out Yamal’s […] The post Netherlands Player Ratings in penalty loss v Spain appeared first on Football Oranje.

arts.ttl: France secure date with Spain in Nations League
arts.sum: Thanks to their penalty shootout win over Croatia at the Stade de France on Sunday (2-0, agg. 2-2, pens 6-4), France have set up a semi-final encounter against Spain, a…

arts.ttl: Spain 3-3 Netherlands: Highlights, man of the match, stats as chaotic UEFA Nations League quarter-final is decided by a penalty shootout
arts.sum: Spain book their spot in the semi-finals of the 2024-25 UEFA Nations League courtesy of a penalty-shootout success over Netherlands.

arts.ttl: Nations League: Netherlands lose on penalties to Spain
arts.sum: The Netherlands missed out on a place in the Nations League semi-finals after a penalty shootout loss to Spain. The tie finished 5-5 on aggregate. Ronald Koeman made one change from the side that drew 2-2 in Rotterdam with Ian Maatsen replacing the suspended Jorrel Hato at left-back. arts.ttl: Liverpool legend fires warning over Mohamed Salah & Virgil van Dijk contracts
arts.sum: Dirk Kuyt urges Liverpool to hand new contracts to Mohamed Salah & Virgil van Dijk soon.

arts.ttl: Liverpool quoted £60m to sign Virgil van Dijk replacement
arts.sum: Liverpool would need to replace Virgil van Dijk in the summer if he does not sign a new contract, and his successor could be Alessandro Bastoni, who is one of the players that sporting director Richard Hughes has sounded out for the centre-back position over the last few months. arts.ttl: Spain vs Netherlands LIVE: Holders bid to reach last four in Nations League quarter-finals
arts.sum: A late Mikel Merino goal means that Spain head into the second leg with a slight advantage
